remarks.para: One N3 indication may be inoperative provided only indication function is inoperative.

numlitem.para: Move standby engine indicator (SEI) selector to ON.
Use SEI N3 RPM indication and accomplish a normal engine start.

note.para: If N3 RPM and start valve operation and indicators are normal, satisfactory operation of the N3 tachometer system is confirmed.

numlitem.para: SEI N3 RPM indication may be used for any procedures requiring N3 RPM.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "EICAS N3 INDICATION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
